Generate RFLOMICS html report or archive

generateReport.Rd

This function is used to generate a html report from a RflomicsMAE-class object or archive with results.

# S4 method for RflomicsMAE
generateReport(
  object,
  fileName = NULL,
  archiveName = NULL,
  export = FALSE,
  tmpDir = getwd(),
  ...
)

Arguments

object

a object of RflomicsSE class or RflomicsMAE-class class.

fileName

Name of the html report (default: date()_projectName.html).

archiveName

name of archive with all analysis results (default: date()_projectName.tar.gz).

export

boolean value to create archive (default: FALSE)

tmpDir

temporary directory (default: working directory)

...

other arguments to pass into the render function.

Value

An html report or archive (tar.gz)

Examples

library(RFLOMICS)
# load ecoseed data
data(ecoseed)

# create rflomicsMAE object with ecoseed data
MAE <- createRflomicsMAE(
  projectName = "Tests",
  omicsData   = list(ecoseed$RNAtest, ecoseed$metatest, ecoseed$protetest),
  omicsNames  = c("RNAtest", "metatest", "protetest"),
  omicsTypes  = c("RNAseq","metabolomics","proteomics"),
  ExpDesign   = ecoseed$design,
  factorRef   = ecoseed$factorRef)

formulae <- generateModelFormulae(MAE)
MAE <- setModelFormula(MAE, modelFormula = formulae[[1]])

selectedContrasts <- 
  generateExpressionContrast(MAE, contrastType="simple")

MAE <- setSelectedContrasts(MAE, contrastList = selectedContrasts)

## data processing
MAE <- runDataProcessing(
  object = MAE, 
  SE.name = "protetest", 
  samples=NULL, 
  normMethod="none", 
  transformMethod="none")
#> [RFLOMICS] #    => select samples...
#> [RFLOMICS] #    => transformation data...
#> [RFLOMICS] #    => Run normalization...
#> [RFLOMICS] #    => Compute PCA 

## diff analysis
MAE <- runDiffAnalysis(
  object = MAE, 
  SE.name = "protetest", 
  contrastList = 
    selectedContrasts, 
  p.adj.method="BH", 
  method = "limmalmFit",  
  p.adj.cutoff = 0.05, 
  logFC.cutoff = 0)

## Enrichment
MAE <- runAnnotationEnrichment(
  object = MAE, 
  SE.name = "protetest", 
  database = "GO", 
  domain = c("MF"), 
  list_args = list(OrgDb = "org.At.tair.db", 
                   keyType = "TAIR", 
                   pvalueCutoff = 0.05))

# get name of performed analysis
getAnalyzedDatasetNames(MAE)
#> $DataProcessing
#> [1] "protetest"
#> 
#> $DiffExpEnrichAnal
#> $DiffExpEnrichAnal$GO
#> [1] "protetest"
#> 
#> 

# generate report
#generateReport(object = MAE, fileName = ecoseed_report.html)
